CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "Magic Surrounds Girl Friends' Pittsburgh Meet - Gay Columbusites - One of the largest contingents of GF's came from Columbus, Ohio. Snapper at the brunch, they are, seated, Lucille Roan, Wilma McClung, Maxine Hamlar, Betty Brewer.  Standing: Minnie White, Roberta Basnett, Adoria Whitaker, LaVerne Dukes, Kay McGill and Rosalie Rosemond."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eleven women from Columbus, Ohio, seated, left to right: Lucille Roan, Wilma McClung, Maxine Hamlar, and Betty Brewer; standing, left to right: Minnie White, Roberta Basnett, Adoria Whitaker, LaVerne Dukes, Kay McGill, and Rosalie Rosemond, gathered in  Penn Sheraton Hotel with moire wallpaper and cityscape patterned curtains for Thirtieth Anniversary Convention of Girl Friends, Inc. brunch, another version
